questions.question: The systemic perspective network is composed by the following subjects:

Spanish, social studies, French, Pastoral and English
Arts,pastoral, explora and music
Spanish, French,English and biology
It is a specific statement or prediction

questions.question: Which of the following IS NOT related to the hypothesis

choices.answer: It can be tested
It is not a moral or ethical question (it is not a value judgement)
It is neither too specific, nor too general
It is not valuable if proven false

questions.question: “ The more careful you are , the lower the risk to get infected ”. This type of hypotheses is :

choices.answer: Y and X are associated (or, there’s anassociation between Y and X)
Y is related to X but X is not related to Y
Y is related to X (or, Y is dependent on X).
As X increases, Y decreases

questions.question: WHAT DO WE DO IN COMMON IN OUR SPANISH, PASTORAL, FRENCH, SOCIAL STUDIES AND ENGLISH?

choices.answer: We pray for the world’s peace
We use a second language
We solve math problems
literacy acquisition (reading andwriting)

questions.question: The analysis and synthesis protocol has the following order:

choices.answer: Identify  the problem- define the type of analysis – apply it to a context.
define the type of analysis – call the mechanician- buy a new car
apply it to a context- define the type of analysis
define the type of analysis- apply it to a context
Crear conflictos e imponer mis ideas
Defender o rechazar, aportar razones di­versas, alguna idea o pensamiento.
Dar instrucciones de como opera una máquina
Escribir cartas de amor y poesía.

questions.question: ¿Cuál es la finalidad de este tipo de texto?

choices.answer: persuadir,convencer, aconsejar
Mostrar la única respuesta correcta.
Ofender
Enriquecer la producción literaria

questions.question: ¿Cuáles son las partes del texto argumentativo?

choices.answer: La síntesis , protocolo y enunciado
Titulo – autor- crítica
Análisis- síntesis – conclusión
La tesis o hipótesis, el cuerpo argumentativo y la conclusión

questions.question: Cual de los siguientes tipos de texto NO es argumentativo:

Discurso político
Crítica artística

questions.question: De quoi s’agit la lettre de réclamation qu’on doit écrire ?

choices.answer: D’une réclamation qu’on fait aux amis quand ils ne t’appellent pas.
D’une lettre qu’on envoie à une amie quand on est amoureux

D’un problème d’internet à la maison

questions.question: Quel est le but de cette lettre?

choices.answer: Demander un remboursement ou un remplacement
Demander un prix ou une valise
Demander une lettre et une note
Demander un emprunt d'argent

questions.question: Students are at their most productive when they study in advance rather than CRAMMING “ . in this sentence cramming mean

choices.answer: To plan carefully your time schedule
to prioritize tasks when there are multiple things to complete
to study intensively over a short period of time before an examination
to cheat
